pkgmetadata.longdescription: Metaheuristic Optimization Framework for Preprocessing Combinations // Automation of preprocessing often requires computationally costly preprocessing combinations. This package helps to find near-best combinations faster. Sub heuristics supported are random and grid restarts, taboo list, decreasing probability for accepting inferior solutions and location of previously best solution candidate is compared to. The package is intended to be used with package 'preprocomb' and takes its 'GridClass' object as input.
